sn35.150:1.3: katama ca sa, bhikkhave, nibbanasappaya patipada?
sn35.150:3.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.150:5.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.150:9.3: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.150:11.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.150:13.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.150:15.1: “Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, rupesupi nibbindati, cakkhuvinnanepi nibbindati, cakkhusamphassepi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.150:15.2: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.150:15.5: Ayam kho sa, bhikkhave, nibbanasappaya patipada”ti.
